subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy, a Northern Ireland teenager, jumped to No. 16 in the world rankings after his first tour victory in the Dubai Desert Classic. McIlroy shot a two-under 70 for a one-shot victory over Justin Rose. He is three spots behind Ernie Els in the world rankings. McIlroy, the top amateur at the 2007 British Open at Carnoustie, also tied for fifth in Abu Dhabi two weeks ago, lost a playoff in Hong Kong in November and tied for third at the South African Open in December.
